title: Display diagnostic widget in Settings page, only when the widget is enabled
body:
(cherry picked from commit 1a59cad)

Please issue pull request against the `3.x-dev` branch only.

Piwik 2 is in LTS mode. This means we do not accept any pull request for 2.x except critical security bugs and major data loss bugs. 

If you need to create a pull request for 2.x, then please also create the pull request against the `3.x-dev` so we can merge both.

Happy hacking!

title: Performance issues on site loading times (ecommerce)

labels.name: answered
labels.description: For when a question was asked and we referred to forum or answered it.

body:
Hello, 
After updating piwik to version 3.0 i have observed that my site sometimes loads much slower and today i discovered why.

It seems that piwik takes up to 1.5-1.7 seconds to finish uploading its bytes of info on pages with ecommerce products.

That is, on most pages of my site piwik.php is done in 3-400 ms.. Kinda much, but that`s the way it goes. But on pages with products (woocommerce) it takes anywhere from 1.3 - 2 seconds!!! I worked so hard to optimize the site to make it load very fast, 2 seconds latency due to piwik is huge.

Checked this today tens of times to be sure, piwik.php is definitely 3-4 times slower on those product pages, and there must be a reason. Also, this is surely something new, related to latest version.

If it matters, subsequent uploads to piwik due to pings are 200-300 ms, regardless of page.

See attached images with 2 example, normal page vs product page and the difference in time.

![snip1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/8209518/22376638/7ba9d92c-e4b7-11e6-8550-b73e65052529.PNG)
![snip2](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/8209518/22376667/9975f33c-e4b7-11e6-9674-da9852da71e1.PNG)

title: Tracking code is wrong for piwik server behind a proxy

labels.name: duplicate
labels.description: For issues that already existed in our issue tracker and were reported previously.

title: FAQ improvement for faq_98 / Using Apache Module RPAF

labels.name: c: Website matomo.org
labels.description: For issues related to our matomo.org website.

labels.name: not-in-changelog
labels.description: For issues or pull requests that should not be included in our release changelog on matomo.org.

body:
https://piwik.org/faq/how-to-install/#faq_98

How do I configure Piwik when the server is installed behind a proxy?

Second way:

Running piwik on an Apache web server behind a reverse-proxy one can use the RPAF Apache module to replace remote address by HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR address.

```
On Debian/Ubuntu:
apt-get install libapache2-mod-rpaf
edit the /etc/apache2/mods-enabled/rpaf.conf

<IfModule rpaf_module>
 RPAFenable On
 RPAFsethostname On
 RPAFproxy_ips IP-OF-YOUR-PROXY-SERVER
 RPAFheader X-Forwarded-For
</IfModule>

apachectl restart
```
More information about RPAF: https://github.com/gnif/mod_rpaf
---

Apache 2.4 and 2.5:
https://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.4/mod/mod_remoteip.html

title: Search Keywords with No Results report issue (probably wrong filtering with lots of data)

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: For errors / faults / flaws.

labels.name: Waiting for user feedback
labels.description: Indicates the Matomo team is waiting for feedback from the author or other users.

milestone.title: Backlog (Help wanted)
milestone.description: This is our backlog of issues. Help wanted!

body:
Hi,
I have a problem with "Search Keywords with No Results" report. 
Piwik version: 2.16.2.

Problem:

1. Using a segment in this report results in more data than is available for "All visits" setting (makes no sense). In this case I'm using example segment "visitEcommerceStatus==abandonedCart" but I think it does not matter. This is only happening with lots of data (I have a case of 1 day of 250K actions).

Steps to reproduce:

1. For some specific day (1 day is enough) have enough data so that this method's: https://github.com/piwik/piwik/blob/2.16.2/plugins/Actions/API.php#L280 resulting DataTable is full and is limited to 499 rows (according to the setting datatable_archiving_maximum_rows_actions = 500).

1. Have records so that this condition below is fulfilled so that rows with \`28\`= 1 (\`28\` is 'INDEX_SITE_SEARCH_HAS_NO_RESULT') are spread evenly in the result set:
``CASE WHEN (MAX(log_link_visit_action.custom_var_v5) = 0
 AND log_link_visit_action.custom_var_k5 = '_pk_scount')
 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
 AS `28` ``. Here is the full archiving query I believe is used for aggregation: https://gist.github.com/mkrakiewicz/e3219368fa32a1a7491d49904a9418cf

1. Then, resulting rows are filtered AFTER the result set is "clipped" to 500 records: 
https://github.com/piwik/piwik/blob/2.16.2/plugins/Actions/API.php#L286

1. If I set datatable_archiving_maximum_rows_actions = -1, then the report is correct (after choosing a segment there are less keywords than in "All results" setting). Also several missing keywords appear. However then in above API method the DataTable row count is way more than default 500 (thousands in my case).

Conclusion:
Because the archiving query has several subqueries/groupings, there can be more records matching \`28\`= 1 than DataTable allows. Also, because each keyword is listed, this column cannot be summed in other way I believe. That means, even if in DataTable there are 500 rows, in the report there can be a few keywords or 0 records after filtering is done, while in reality there are several keywords which were cut off from the result.

Proposed fix:

1. Remove the filtering in API method.

1. Apply filtering on query level during archiving and have separate report for that. Currently `Actions_sitesearch` is used both by `getSiteSearchNoResultKeywords` and `getSiteSearchKeywords`.

title: Replace prefilled values in Name & SiteUrl with placeholders.

labels.name: c: Usability
labels.description: For issues that let users achieve a defined goal more effectively or efficiently.

body:
The add site form has prefilled values for both Name (Name) and SiteUrl (http://siteUrl.com/\nhttp://siteUrl2.com/). 
This is annoying because you then have to remove the existing content when filling in the form.
Hence I suggest using those values as placeholders instead of default values.

title: Added a new method that allows plugins to define metrics we expect to see percentage values

labels.name: c: Platform
labels.description: For Matomo platform changes that aren't impacting any of our APIs but improve the core itself.

labels.name: Needs Review
labels.description: For pull requests that need a code review.

body:
I first used an event in `Metrics::getMetricIdsToProcessReportTotal` but this makes all reports quite a bit slower as you can see it iterates a lot over all the metrics and all rows and all columns in `sumColumnValueToTotal`. Therefore it is much better to add a method to report class so we iterate over metrics only when needed.

I tried to add a test but couldn't really manage to write one.

title: [WIP] New flag icons

labels.name: c: Design / UI
labels.description: For issues that impact Matomo's user interface or the design overall.

body:
#11155

I have probably missed some places, where the icons are used:
#### checked:
- Visitors -> Locations
- Real Time Map popup
- Visitor Log
- Visitors in Real-time
- PDF Report
- HTML Report
- Visitor Log in Piwik App
 - unfortunately the app is caching the images, even if the account is deleted and readded.
 - but on my phone some of the new flags were loaded and displayed correctly

#### TODO
Goal Overview: http://builds-artifacts.piwik.org/piwik/piwik/3.x-dev/22170/UIIntegrationTest_goals_individual_goal_updated.png

How can I modify the metadata?
https://github.com/piwik/piwik/blob/3.x-dev/plugins/Goals/templates/_listTopDimension.twig#L10

#### New Unknown Flag:

![xx 1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6266037/22253708/e8e5ebd2-e252-11e6-9bcf-192f5636c9e8.png)

#### TI
```
1) Piwik\Plugins\UserCountry\tests\Unit\UserCountryTest::testFlagsAndContinents
Failed asserting that an array contains 'ti.png'.
```
There is no country with the languagecode ti in https://dev.maxmind.com/geoip/legacy/codes/iso3166/
It seems to be the **NATO** code for Tajikistan, but the ISO Code is TJ (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2:TJ), where the icon can be found.

title: Define icon size for plugin icon in popup in visitor log

labels.name: c: Design / UI
labels.description: For issues that impact Matomo's user interface or the design overall.

body:
Another place where the icon size is not defined:
![bildschirmfoto von 2017-01-23 22-05-14](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6266037/22239727/26ef783e-e218-11e6-93ab-1347cb5c6f28.png)

Unfortunately this shows a mistake I made when generating the new icons:
I replaced the white background with transparency to replicate the look of the old icons. But this also replaced white parts of the logos, which isn't visible normally but looks ugly on non-white backgrounds:
![bildschirmfoto von 2017-01-24 09-36-38](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6266037/22239923/d2a76d62-e218-11e6-9238-e865a20ef8f9.png)

To fix it I would need to regenerate all icons and replace them either with non-transparent ones or use floodfill from one corner (which may create new issues if the background is not one connected background. 

Of course there is also the "hack" of adding `background: white;` to the icons.

title: Add the need to regenerate old reports to FAQ#113

labels.name: answered
labels.description: For when a question was asked and we referred to forum or answered it.

body:
[Faq#113](http://piwik.org/faq/how-to/faq_113/) explains how to turn on `Unique Vistor` for future reports.

But it fails highlight that old reports are not fixed up.
This confuses people, as can be seen for example [here](https://github.com/piwik/piwik/issues/11179#issuecomment-274366280).

Please add a remark to [Faq#113](http://piwik.org/faq/how-to/faq_113/) similar to the one from [`config/global.ini`](https://github.com/piwik/piwik/blob/ae8a94575735b4ef0e0249cebe0087462f429715/config/global.ini.php#L139):
 
```
; if you set it to 1 and want the Unique Visitors to be re-processed for reports in the past,
 drop all piwik_archive_* tables
```

That would help to see why Unique Visitors may work for the current year, but fails for previous years. And it would explain how to fix the issue.

(Is there a repo for the faqs? I tried [searching](https://github.com/search?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=org%3Apiwik+%22metric+for+Yearly%22&type=Code&ref=searchresults) [for](https://github.com/search?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=org%3Apiwik+%22By+default+Piwik+will+not+process%22&type=Code&ref=searchresults) [it](https://github.com/search?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=org%3Apiwik+%22query+to+process+the+number+of+unique%22&type=Code&ref=searchresults), but could not find it. Hence, I could not upload a pull request)

title: Auto login feature broken in Safari

labels.name: duplicate
labels.description: For issues that already existed in our issue tracker and were reported previously.

body:
It seems that the auto login feature doesn't work while in a iframe in Safari. It works fine in other browsers I've tested.

I think it's related to a wrong X-Frame-Options header. The headers contains the value ", AA".

We're on Piwik 3.0.1, PHP 7, Ubuntu 16.04, Nginx 1.11.8. the enable_framed_pages option is enabled.

title: Cross Domain: forward pk_vid parameter when the clicked element is not directly a link but is within the link <a> element itself
body:
Follows up #11243 ### Missing tests Ideally would add some test for this but did not manage to succeed. Found the existing content tracking tests which are similar and could be used for inspiration but unfortunately outlink / download / cross domain are not already integration tested so it's a bit involved to start writing tests... ### Improvement of this PR When we have an element within the link such as: ```html Hello
click me
 ``` and the element within is clicked, eg. `click me` is clicked, then the Cross Domain `pk_vid` parameter should still be added to `http://example.org/?pk_vid=xyz`. The call to `getSourceElement` does this trick nicely...

title: Improve geographical segmentations

labels.name: Help wanted
labels.description: Beginner friendly issues

labels.name: c: Usability
labels.description: For issues that let users achieve a defined goal more effectively or efficiently.

milestone.title: Priority Backlog (Help wanted)
milestone.description: Most important issues we should tackle next. If you can help: please join the discussion and/or issue a pull request ([help](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/contributing-to-piwik-core)).

body:
At this time the suggestions for geographical segmentations need some hands on to be useable:

1. **CONTINENT**
at this time some aberrations are show. Imho showing full names of countries is much more userfriendly.
e.g. **Europe**
what do you think of working with a list of 7 continents?
see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Continent#Number

2. **COUNTRY**
at this time only country codes are shown.
Imho showing full names of countries is much more userfriendly.
What do you think of helping users with some additional info to find the right one?
ok e.g. **Germany (Europe)** is pretty easy. but what about e.g. **Comoros (Africa)**?

3. **REGION**
looks pretty broken. See also https://github.com/piwik/piwik/issues/7428
What do you think of helping user with some additional info to find the right one?
e.g. **Niedersachsen (Germany, Europe)**

4. **CITY**
how are cities with same name but within different countries/regiens handled? e.g. Hannover
=> should one always need to apply a second filter? or should one show city name several times but with an addition following scheme from above like e.g. **"Hannover (Niedersachsen, Germany, Europe)"**

This is how it looks like in Piwik 3.0.2b1:
![2017-01-23_11h23_00](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5681880/22201143/a55bb3f6-e162-11e6-8bb7-9fc26a596a24.png)
![2017-01-23_11h24_39](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5681880/22201154/af5aaa42-e162-11e6-8a6d-494934159a6a.png)
![2017-01-23_11h54_56](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5681880/22201178/cb9e7e4a-e162-11e6-9a6a-2e3b88da8ceb.png)
![2017-01-23_11h25_52](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5681880/22201182/cffaba12-e162-11e6-8078-e22ae163e91d.png)

title: "Page URL not defined" message in Visitor Log

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: For errors / faults / flaws.

labels.name: worksforme
labels.description: The issue cannot be reproduced and things work as intended.

labels.name: Waiting for user feedback
labels.description: Indicates the Matomo team is waiting for feedback from the author or other users.

milestone.title: Priority Backlog (Help wanted)
milestone.description: Most important issues we should tackle next. If you can help: please join the discussion and/or issue a pull request ([help](https://developer.matomo.org/guides/contributing-to-piwik-core)).

body:
I have been seeing some "Page URL not defined" in the Visitor Log in the past few versions of Piwik.

I have not been able to identify the reasons why this happens nor the circumstances in which it happens, all the more since the same page may lead to that message and, at other times, yield a "normal" URL (see the attached image).

![image 140](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7868710/22184910/9a61875a-e0db-11e6-8fd4-e7d0131fb423.png)

For all page visits for which the URL appears as not defined, the "Visitors in Real-time" widget will show the URL of the current page URL (e.g. "https://analytics.khalemy.com/index.php?module=CoreHome&action=index&idSite=1&period=range&date=last30#") as the URL of the page that has been visited, which is of course totally wrong.

I don't know whether the page protocol (HTTP vs HTTPS) has something to do with the issue or not.

Maybe that it's a configuration issue on my part, but I'm positive that this issue did not present itself earlier, for instance two or four years ago.

title: Manually removing files

labels.name: answered
labels.description: For when a question was asked and we referred to forum or answered it.

body:
It seems that after every upgrade some files need to be removed manually to make Piwik run again.
After having used Piwik for quite some years, and another upgrade (2.16  3.01) that brought my Piwik installation to it's knees, I thought I'd do a big cleanup.

Before I start removing files, I'd like your advice.
This is the strategy I came up with:

Create a list of all the files in my installation:

cd <piwik dir>/
find . -print | sort > ~/piwik.me.files

Download the latest version from GitHub, extract it, and create a list of files in that version (same commands, different filename).

Find the difference between the 2, and delete files that no longer exist:

comm -23 ~/piwik.me.files ~/piwik.github.files

First question is 'Would this be the way to go?'.

If so, then please advice on how to use common sense with this list. E.g.

> Ignore all .png files, as we replaced .gif with .png.

> Ignore plugins/* except plugins/CorePluginsAdmin/*

> etc.

Thank you.

title: Release 3.0.2-b1
Added new keyboard shortcuts, "s" for selector, "d" for calendar, "w" for site selector

labels.name: Enhancement
labels.description: For new feature suggestions that for example enhance Matomo's cabapilities..

body:
s for selector
d for calendar
w for site selector
from https://github.com/piwik/piwik/pull/11235

title: Cross Domain linking in JavaScript tracking client piwik.js

labels.name: Enhancement
labels.description: For new feature suggestions that for example enhance Matomo's cabapilities..

body:
To make feature work one has to 
1) Configure `setDomains()` 
2) Enable `enableCrossDomainLinking()`

If link is going to different domain that belongs to same Piwik website, it will add two URL parameters:

`pk_vid=900d0d1eb6714aa41484879482d2bb13`

Where we have 1) visitorId (16 char) 2) the current timestamp (10 char) and 3) a hashed combination of userAgent / platform to make sure when a user shares it, the visitorId won't be applied to another user. Timestamp is only valid for 45 seconds, and only works on same browser / platform when same browser features are enabled.

So far it works for clicks and right click open in new window (if this tracking feature is enabled).

It is important to enable "enableCrossDomainLinking" on the target page (different domain) as well.

Backend part is still missing and needs to be implement later. 

@mattab can you have a look when you have time?

title: File integrity check failed dramatically

labels.name: duplicate
labels.description: For issues that already existed in our issue tracker and were reported previously.

body:
I am trying to upgrade from Piwik 3.0.0 to 3.0.1 using Softaculous in cPanel on Namecheap servers. I have upgraded Piwik a number of times in the past without incident.
This time, however, upgraded on Softaculous, then clicked the button to the Piwik page that says "Database Upgrade Required". On this page, I see "File integrity check failed and reported some errors." When I click details, I see the this long list of errors: https://gist.github.com/daniel-barrows/5b8c0d51f71754cf4d074f085b8916b6
I have two problems:
1) My problem: How do I upgrade? It says "You should fix this issue and then refresh this page until it shows no error." I don't know how to fix it.
2) Your problem: I suspect it's a bug that I am seeing <br/> tags instead of actual line breaks. The html source of the error page is at https://gist.github.com/daniel-barrows/1a1e17ec9ea46a82f923e484ff4586e4

This issue seems similar to https://github.com/piwik/piwik/issues/11129 and https://github.com/piwik/piwik/issues/9233

title: Core Provider plugin Column class has no $columnType property and prevents location_provider field from being created in piwik_log_visit table

labels.name: answered
labels.description: For when a question was asked and we referred to forum or answered it.

body: I ran into an issue installing the core Provider plugin by adding it to the [Plugins] and [PluginsInstalled] sections in config.ini.php. The plugin seems to be installed but the table piwik_log_visit is missing the column location_provider. Even deactivating and activating the Provider plugin will not create the column. I even tried running the core:update script via command line which said database was up-to-date. I noticed that other core plugins that have Provider class extending VisitDimension class have $columnType property. After adding $columnType property and running the core:update the column was created. Note that a fresh install without Provider in config.ini.php, activating through UI will create column correctly. The bug can be reproduced only by installing via config.ini.php. I think code should be changed to include $columnType property in the Provider plugin Provider class.

title: SMS Provider: new integration for ASP SMS

labels.name: Enhancement
labels.description: For new feature suggestions that for example enhance Matomo's cabapilities..

body:
Goal of this issue is to integrate a new SMS API Provider in Piwik. Currently Clockwork SMS provider is available but we'd like to introduce a new Swiss-based provider: ASP SMS. https://www.aspsms.com/

## Some more information

### How to call the API to send SMS

* we could simply use this super simple API: https://www.aspsms.com/en/http/
* or maybe we could use this existing PHP library which connects to the API? https://github.com/nadar/aspsms 

### How to get counted as affiliate when users send SMS

* Set "AffiliateID" parameter to "227830" when calling operations that send text messages. 
* use this link when linking to ASPSMS create account for our users:
http://www.aspsms.com/en/?REF=227830


### Some proposed text to use in the Piwik UI when talking about ASP SMS

#### What are ASPSMS Credits and how do I buy some?

For sending an SMS, you need so-called ASPSMS credits,
which are purchased in advance. The ASPSMS credits do
not expire. Payment by bank transfer, various credit
cards such as Eurocard/Mastercard, Visa, American
Express or Diners Club, PayPal or Swiss Postcard.
https://www.aspsms.com/instruction/payment.asp

title: Event tracking with trackEvent: a value of 0 (zero) is not recorded

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: For errors / faults / flaws.

body:
I am manually tracking events with this code:
`_paq.push(['trackEvent', 'docs', 'feedback', document.title, 0]);`

The last argument, value, is either 1 or 0. Anything > 0 gets recorded correctly, for instance, 0.1, but 0 is not. I get a "-" in the table of events.

Related to this, I tried passing string values instead ("yes", "no"), and they do not get recorded at all (I always see a "-" in the events table).

I cannot find any details on the supported types/ranges for the value argument, can anybody please give me a clue as to how this exactly works or point me to the documentation about it?

In Visitors > Software > Browser Plugins, Cookie shows 100% but it likely shouldn't, as we would expect some people maybe disable cookie tracking (first party).

To investigate further we could try to disable cookie in our browser, and then check whether Piwik detects correctly that cookies are disabled.

The error was: SQLSTATE[42000]: Syntax error or access violation: 1142 ALTER command denied to user 'DB'@'127.0.0.1' for table 'piwik_plugin_setting'

title: Allowed memory size exhausted in FileIntegrity.getDirectoriesFoundInManifest()
body:
After upgrading Piwik from 2.17.1 to the new version 3.0.1 (using official debian package) I get a fatal error due to missing allowed memory size when I execute the system checks in admin area. 
`PHP Fatal error: Allowed memory size of 536870912 bytes exhausted (tried to allocate 72 bytes) in /mydir/piwik/core/FileIntegrity.php on line 259`
My php memory limit is 512Mb, increasing the memory limit did not help. When I manually remove the code from FileIntegrity.getDirectoriesFoundInManifest() the system checks run fine.
I do not understand why `getDirectoriesFoundInManifest()` in FileIntegrity.php consumes as much memory?

Any ideas?
